net.dragondelve.customdriversutil.gui

Class CustomDriverUtilController

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.dragondelve.customdriversutil.gui.CustomDriverUtilController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StageController

    public class CustomDriverUtilController
extends java.lang.Object
implements StageController
    Controls the main screen of the CustomDriverUtility. Controls the top menu and what is shown inside the rootPane

      • rootPane

        private javafx.scene.layout.BorderPane rootPane
        Root Pane of the main screen. Is used to display everything inside the main window. The main css style is applied to the rootPane.

        Central Anchor Pane that is used to display the Driver Editor.

      • importGridWithClassItem

        private javafx.scene.control.MenuItem importGridWithClassItem
        Import Grid with a Vehicle Class Item. Imports the Grid with a Vehicle class, adding the vehicle class to the current VehicleClassLibrary.

      • importGridItem

        private javafx.scene.control.MenuItem importGridItem
        Imports a Grid. Imports the grid without the vehicle class.

        Export Track Library Menu Item. Shows a FileChooser and if a selection is made attempts to export the currently loaded track library to this file.

        Import Track Library Menu Item. Shows a FileChooser and if a selection is made attempts to import a track library. from the File chosen.

        Import Vehicle Class Library Menu Item. Shows a FileChooser and if a selection is made attempts to import a vehicle class library from the File chosen.

        private javafx.scene.control.MenuItem configurationMenuItem
        Shows a configuration screen allowing the user to directly edit the configuration file. Performs configurationAction on action.

      • exportDriverLibraryItem

        private javafx.scene.control.MenuItem exportDriverLibraryItem
        Shows a FileChooser and if a selection is made attempts to export a driver library from the file chosen. Performs exportDriverLibraryAction on action.

        private javafx.scene.control.MenuItem massModifyItem
        Opens the MassModifyTool Window and allows the user to modify the grid. Perfomrs massModifyAction on action.

      • importDriverLibraryItem

        private javafx.scene.control.MenuItem importDriverLibraryItem
        Shows a FileChooser and if a selection is made attempts to import a driver library form the file chosen. Performs importDriverLibraryAction on action.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        Initialize method initializes all the visual elements before they are displayed by the user. initialize method is called automatically by JavaFX when this editor is being loaded from XML.

      • setStage

        public void setStage(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
        Lightweight mutator method. Should be called before this class is displayed to the user.
        Specified by:
        setStage in interface StageController
        Parameters:
        stage - Stage on which this controller is going to be displayed.

      • setEditedGrid

        public void setEditedGrid(Grid grid)
        Lightweight mutator method. Should be called before the initialize() method is called.
        Parameters:
        grid - Grid to be edited in the Custom Driver Utility.

      • addDriverAction

        private void addDriverAction()
        Adds a new driver to the editedGrid.

      • removeDriverAction

        private void removeDriverAction()
        If a driver is selected in the driversTableView, removes the selected driver form the editedGrid.

      • addLibraryDriverAction

        private void addLibraryDriverAction()
        Adds the driver currently selected in driversTableView to the Driver Library Performed by addLibraryDriverButton on action.

      • removeLibraryDriverAction

        public void removeLibraryDriverAction()
        Removes the driver currently selected in the libraryTableView

      • addTrackOverrideAction

        private void addTrackOverrideAction()
        Opens the DefineTrack step window. If any tracks are chosen by the user it adds a new TrackOverride for the tracks selected..

      • editTrackOverrideAction

        private void editTrackOverrideAction()
        if a track override is chosen in the trackOverrideTalbeView it opens the defineTrackStep window and passes it the currently selected track override for editing.

      • removeTrackOverrideAction

        private void removeTrackOverrideAction()
        if a track override is chosen in the trackOverrideTableView removes the selected track.

      • initTrackOverrideEditor

        private void initTrackOverrideEditor(TrackOverride override)
        Initializes the Track Override Editor by opening the defineTrackStep and passing it the trackOverride that is passed as an argument.
        Parameters:
        override - Track specific override that is going to be edited by the trackOverrideEditor.

      • newGridAction

        private void newGridAction()
        Loads the New Grid Wizard FXML and shows the New Grid wizard in this window by creating a new scene and setting this StageController's stage scene to the new scene that contains the new grid wizard. Performed by NewGridItem.

      • exportGridAction

        private void exportGridAction()
        Action that is performed by ExportGridItem. Exports the currently edited grid to an XML file chosen by the FileChooser that is displayed to the user. If the selection is made exports the currently edited grid to the file selected.

      • importGridWithClassAction

        private void importGridWithClassAction()
        Action that is performed by importGridITemWithClassItem. Displays the file chooser with extension filters set for xml files only in the grids folder by default. If a selection is made it will attempt to import the grid.

      • importGridAction

        private void importGridAction()
        Action that is performed by ImportGridItem. Displays the file chooser with extension filters set for xml files only in the grids folder by default. If a selection is made it will attempt to import the grid.

      • editTracksAction

        private void editTracksAction()
        Action that is performed by editTracksItem. Opens a new Stage with a TrackLibraryEditor, and waits until the stage is closed by the user.

      • exportTracksAction

        private void exportTracksAction()
        Action that is performed by the exportTracksItem. Opens a FileChooser with the *.xml extension filter, displays the FileChooser to the user and allows them to make a selection. When the FileChooser is closed if a file was selected it attempts to export the currently loaded TrackLibrary to the chosen file.

      • importTracksAction

        private void importTracksAction()
        Action that is performed by importTracksItem. Opens a FileChooser with the *.xml extension filter, displays the FileChooser to the user and allows them to make a selection. When the FileChooser is closed if a file was selected it attempts to import a TrackLibrary from a chosen file.

      • editVehicleClassesAction

        private void editVehicleClassesAction()
        Action that is performed by editVehicleClassesItem. Opens a new Stage with a VehicleClassLibraryEditor, and waits until the stage is closed by the user.

      • exportVehicleClassesAction

        private void exportVehicleClassesAction()
        Action that is performed by importVehicleClassesItem. Opens a FileChooser with the *.xml extension filter, displays the FileChooser to the user and allows them to make a selection. When the FileChooser is closed if a file was selected it attempts to export the currently loaded VehicleClassLibrary to the chosen file.

      • massModifyAction

        private void massModifyAction()
        Creates a new stage on which the MassModifyTool scene is going to be displayed. performed by massModifyItem on action.

      • importVehicleClassesAction

        private void importVehicleClassesAction()
        Opens a FileChooser with the *.xml extension filter, displays the FileChooser to the user and allows them to make a selection. When the FileChooser is closed if a file was selected it attempts to import a VehicleClassLibrary from the chosen file.

      • exportDriverLibraryAction

        private void exportDriverLibraryAction()
        Action that is performed by exportDriverLibraryItem. Opens a FileChooser with the *.xml extension filter, displays the FileChooser to the user and allows them to make a selection. When the FileChooser is closed if a file was selected it attempts to export the currently loaded DriverLibrary to the chosen file.

      • importDriverLibraryAction

        private void importDriverLibraryAction()
        Opens a FileChooser with the *.xml extension filter, displays the FileChooser to the user and allows them to make a selection. When the FileChooser is closed if a file was selected it attempts to import a DriverLibrary from the chosen file.

      • configurationAction

        private void configurationAction()
        Shows the ConfigurationScreen on a separate stage. This action is performed by the configurationMenuItem.

      • openEditor

        private void openEditor(java.net.URL editorFXMLURL,
                        StageController controller,
                        java.lang.String title)
        Creates a stage on which an editor controlled by a StageController can be displayed. Loads an FXML File from the URL, sets the controller and finally displays the stage.
        Parameters:
        editorFXMLURL - URL to a FXML file that contains the editor's gui information.
        controller - Controller to be used for the new Stage.
        title - Text title to be displayed on the new Stage.

      • chooseFileToOpen

        private java.io.File chooseFileToOpen(java.lang.String title,
                                      java.lang.String initialDirectory)
        Creates a new FileChooser, sets its extension filter to *.xml and sets its initial directory to the pathname provided. and the title of its Stage to the title provided. Displays the FileChooser to the user with showOpenDialog, waits for a selection to be made and returns the File selected.
        Parameters:
        title - Title of the Stage on which the FileChooser is going to be displayed.
        initialDirectory - Pathname to an initial directory for the FileChooser.
        Returns:
        File Chosen by the user. returns null if no file was chosen.

      • chooseFileToSave

        private java.io.File chooseFileToSave(java.lang.String title,
                                      java.lang.String initialDirectory)
        Creates a new FileChooser, sets its extension filter to *.xml and sets its initial directory to the pathname provided. and the title of its Stage to the title provided. Displays the FileChooser to the user with showSaveDialog, waits for a selection to be made and returns the File selected.
        Parameters:
        title - Title of the Stage on which the FileChooser is going to be displayed.
        initialDirectory - Pathname to an initial directory for the FileChooser.
        Returns:
        File Chosen by the user. returns null if no file was chosen.

      • initTooltips

        private void initTooltips()
        Initializes all tooltips for the control elements
